items.description: Share your status with family only when necessary. Connection for peace of mind, not surveillance.

items.description: Manage daily life by phone: weather, schedule, medication reminders, and more.

questions.a: With one phone call, we handle or organise hospital, administrative, health, and daily living issues for you.

questions.q: Do I need to install an app?
questions.a: No. All you need is a telephone.
This is a phone-based life support service for middle-aged and senior individuals living alone.
